action.name: Call function
action.param: "Sooo, you wanna play this silly ass game?" & newline & "Click here to expend this notification box." & newline & newline & "Cabbages are falling from the sky. The bees can collect them when they fall on the menhir. The factory transforms them into coleslaw salads. With salads, you can buy more bees, menhir enlargements and factory upgrades." & newline & "-narF"

action.name: Push
action.param: "Si tu vois juste cette notification, ça veut dire que c'est pété. Sinon, tu peux deleter cette ligne"

action.name: Push
action.param: "«Doctors hate her! This single mom has found a way to naturally enlarge your menhir without drugs!»"

action.name: Push
action.param: "«Use this one simple trick to make your menhir twice as big in only 4 weeks!»"

action.name: Push
action.param: "Don't you think your menhir is big enough now?"

action.name: Call function
action.param: "menhir upgrade"{###}"Insecure about the size of your menhir? You're in luck! We are selling menhir enlargement just for you! Discretion guaranteed! ;)"{###}ceil( 3.3^(menhir.level) ){###}"salads"{###}"Buy for "

sub-events.comment: Ignore les "time has passed", sauf si ça fait plus que 5 secondes

action.name: Call function
action.param: "You now have 2 bees." & "«Two bees or not two bees, that is the question!»"

action.name: Call function
action.param: "It was high fee, but that bee is now free. ''Free'' as in ''free beer''."

action.name: Call function
action.param: "And a new worker bee for you. That's the last one of them."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Upgrade silo's capacity. Current: " & silo.capacity & newline & "Cost: " & siloCost

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Upgrade factory's productivity. Current: " & factory.productivity & newline & "Cost: " & factoryCost

action.name: Call function
action.param: "You improved the storage of the silo. It can now store " & silo.capacity & " cabbages before having to throw them away."

action.name: Call function
action.param: "You improved the productivity of the factory. It will now transform " & factory.productivity & " cabbages at a time."
